issue.title: [C++] Implement union-like data type for accommodating kernel arguments which may be scalars or arrays
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1485](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1485). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For example, either argument to the binary operator `Add` may be scalar or array. Some systems have addressed this issue by using arrays of length 1, but I would prefer that we accommodate this in Arrow's C++ data types

comments.body:
